verses.name: 2 Kings 4:31
verses.text: And Gehazi passed on before them, and laid the staff upon the face of the child; but there was neither voice, nor hearing. Wherefore he went again to meet him, and told him, saying, The child is not awaked.

verses.name: 2 Kings 4:32
verses.text: And when Elisha was come into the house, behold, the child was dead, and laid upon his bed.

verses.name: 2 Kings 4:33
verses.text: He went in therefore, and shut the door upon them twain, and prayed unto the Lord.
